programme.title: Nak Dengar Cerita Hantu Ep 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Azman, Craig dan Radhi memilih sebuah flat lama yang sudah tiada lagi penghuni untuk menjalankan kegiatan dadah mereka. Dari hari pertama lagi mereka telah di ganggu.

programme.title: Superbike
programme.desc: Ia berkisar tentang kehidupan seharian sekumpulan penunggang motosikal superbike yang menggelar kumpulan mereka sebagai 'Pirate Bikers' dan diketuai oleh Bugs (Kamal Adli). Berlumba-lumba di jalanan, kejar-mengejar, berkonvoi dan disaman oleh polis telah menjadi rasa masam dalam kehidupan mereka yang berkongsi minat yang sama.

programme.title: Jerangkung Dalam Almari
programme.desc: Kehidupan Fikri (Dato Adi Putra) tidak tenteram kerana sering diganggu oleh jelmaan yang muncul dari dalam almari sehingga mengancam nyawa isterinya Shikin (Sophia Albarakbah) dan anaknya (Isaac Iman).

programme.title: Kapsul
programme.desc: Kapsul masa wawasan 2020 yang ditanam oleh Tun Dr. Mahathir Mohamad telah dicuri dan membawa Zohri ( Faizal Hussein ) kembali ke masa lalu. Zohri kini terperangkap di tengah-tengah pergolakan bangsa Melayu untuk mencapai kemerdekaan dan membawa bangsa Melayu keluar dari belenggu kemiskinan. Zohri melihat dan merasai sendiri erti perjuangan umatnya yang tidak pernah dibayangkannya selama ini. Dia lihat, dia rasa dan kini dia mula faham betapa peritnya liku-liku sejarah negara dan bangsa. Perjalanan Zohri berterusan dari satu zaman ke satu zaman dan tiada siapa yang dapat mengembalikannya ke zamannya melainkan dirinya sendiri.

programme.title: The Presence
programme.desc: Aom dihantui mimpi ngeri yang tidak dapat dijelaskan. Semasa melawat neneknya, dia mendapat tahu bahawa neneknya yang kelihatan lebih mati daripada hidup sedang melayan dan memberi makan kepada hantu. Adakah Aom akan menerima nasibnya?

programme.title: Mumun
programme.desc: Mumun dan Juned adalah pasangan yang saling menyayangi. Walau bagaimanapun, Mumun meninggal dunia dalam satu kemalangan dan Juned sangat kecewa dengannya.

programme.title: Sacred Riana 2: Bloody Mary
programme.desc: Riana ke asrama sekolah Elodia dengan harapan dapat mencari anak patung Riani yang hilang. Para pelajar di situ sering melakukan ritual dengan cermin, iaitu Bloody Mary. Ia yang pada asalnya hanya untuk menakutkan pelajar baru, bertukar menjadi bencana apabila roh cuba mencederakan pelajar. Anak patung Riani didakwa sebagai dalang di sebalik bencana ini. Riana terperangkap dalam dilema antara membawa balik anak patungnya, atau mencari jawapan kepada pelbagai ketakutan yang berlaku.

programme.title: Evolusi KL Drift
programme.desc: Zack dan Sham adalah dua nama yang sinonim dengan istilah keakraban. Hubungan sebagai dua sahabat karib yang sama-sama berkongsi hobi dan minat dalam bidang perlumbaan kereta 'drift'.

programme.title: Dendam Orang Mati
programme.desc: Lena (Lisa Surihani) tersedar dari koma selama dua tahun dan hilang ingatan akibat kemalangan. Keadaan bertambah mengelirukan apabila diperkenalkan kepada isteri baru Shahrul (Fizz Fairuz), Min (Miera Leyana) di flat lamanya di tingkat 4 yang kini menjadi tingkat 3A. Lena mula mengesyaki sesuatu yang buruk telah berlaku flat tersebut dan mula berdepan dengan kejadian-kejadian aneh yang menyeramkan. Gangguan seram ini memberikan lebih tekanan terhadap Lena yang terasa diabaikan oleh suaminya, Shahrul yang berbelah bahagi antara isteri mudanya dan Lena.

programme.title: Siccin 4
programme.desc: Disebabkan masalah kewangan, keluarga Yilmaz berpindah ke rumah nenek mereka Saadet. Rumah lama Saadet, didiami oleh makhluk dari dimensi lain. Dan makhluk ini tidak mahu sesiapa di dalam rumah, tetapi Saadet.

programme.title: Mata Shaitan
programme.desc: Ketika keluar berburu di hutan, Tengku Aman Shah telah tertarik hati dengan seorang gadis bernama Manis yang tinggal bersama bapanya pinggir hutan. Tengku Aman Shah merahsiakan identitinya yang sebenar dan menyamar sebagai seorang penyair bernama Sulaiman. Setelah mendedahkan identitinya, Tengku Aman Shah berkahwin dengan Manis secara rahsia. Ketika Tengku Aman Shah pulang ke istana kerana ayahandanya gering, Manis yang sedang hamil diganggu sekumpulan samseng sehingga mengakibatkan kematian bapanya. Manis melarikan diri ke dalam hutan dan bertemu dengan seorang tua yang berwajah hodoh. Orang tua itu memberi perlindungan kepada Manis sehingga dia melahirkan anak.

programme.title: Lanang Sejagat
programme.desc: Sitara ingin mencari pembunuh bapanya yang bernama Datuk Merah. Dalam perjalanan, dia diserang oleh sekumpulan penjahat tetapi diselamatkan oleh seorang pendekar buta bernama Kasa. Kasa memberitahu Sitara bahawa Datuk Merah telah mati. Sitara terpaksa bermalam di rumah Kasa. Ketika itulah Penghulu mengarahkan orang-orangnya berbuat baik dengan ibu Sitara yang bernama Melati dan menghantar banyak makanan. Sekembalinya Sitara ke rumah, dia berjumpa Penghulu yang meminta pertolongannya untuk membunuh Lanang Sejagat seorang pendekar yang baru muncul di kampung mereka. Suatu hari, pendekar buta Kasa dan anak perempuannya Delima berkunjung ke kampung Sitara. Ketika di rumah Sitara, terbongkarlah rahsia bahawa Kasa sebenarnya adalah Datuk Merah.

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Putera Amran, pewaris takhta kerajaan Zamin Ambar telah dititahkan oleh ayahandanya untuk berkahwin dengan Puteri Faridah dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Namun, Putera Amran tidak bersetuju dengan titah ayahandanya kerana dia mencintai seorang penari istana yang bernama Norlela. Kerajaan Zamin Tauran berasa amat terhina dan merancang sesuatu untuk mengambil alih tampuk pemerintahan kerajaan Zamin Ambar dengan cara Puteri Faridah mesti berkahwin dengan baginda sultan Zamin Tauran.

programme.title: Putera Sangkar Maut
programme.desc: Sultan sering menyamar sebagai peminta sedekah untuk melihat sikap rakyat jelatanya dengan lebih dekat. Pada suatu hari, Sultan telah membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin dengan seorang gadis bernama Nilam dan mengahwinkan kakak Nilam yang bernama Dian dengan Mamanda Menteri. Dian enggan berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri kerana dia ingin menjadi isteri Sultan. Namun atas nasihat kekasihnya Panglima Jahang, Dian berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri sebagai satu helah untuk menggulingkan pemerintahan Sultan.

programme.title: Panggilan Pulau
programme.desc: Percintaan antara Zulkifli dan Jelita mendapat tentangan daripada Johan yang merupakan abang kepada Jelita. Akibat sering dihina kerana tidak memiliki harta, Zulkifli membawa diri dan menjadi kelasi kapal dengan bantuan Umar dan Ramlee. Kehadiran Zulkifli di kapal itu tidak disenangi oleh Kapten dan dua orang kanannya, Musa dan Shukur. Pada suatu hari, kapal yang dinaiki Zulkifli telah karam di lautan dan dia terdampar di sebuah pulau yang bernama Kezambo. Apabila Zulkifli sedar yang dia kini berada di Pulau Kezambo, dia meminta izin kepada penghulu untuk mencari harta karun yang tersimpan di pulau itu.

programme.title: Puteri Gunung Banang
programme.desc: Wira dan dua orang abangnya, Terab dan Toba adalah tiga orang lelaki tua yang hidup di pinggir sebuah desa dalam keadaan miskin. Pada suatu hari, ketika Wira pergi ke Gunung Banang dia telah ditakdirkan untuk masuk ke alam bunian dan bertemu dengan seorang puteri. Wira terkejut apabila melihat wajahnya kembali muda. Sebelum meninggalkan alam bunian dan kembali ke alam nyata, Puteri Gunung Banang telah menghadiahkan Wira semangkuk air hikmat yang mampu menjadi penawar kepada pelbagai penyakit. Wira berjanji akan menggunakannya untuk membantu orang ramai. Apabila tiba di sebuah perkampungan, Wira berjaya memulihkan seorang gadis yang kurang siuman. Apabila berita kehebatan Wira mengubati pesakit ini tersebar, Terab dan Toba merasa iri hati dan merancang untuk melakukan sesuatu.

programme.title: Jambatan Maut
programme.desc: Untuk mempertahankan maruah diri daripada diganggu Haron, Hamidah telah mengambil keputusan untuk terjun ke dalam sungai dari sebuah jambatan. Dia kemudiannya dibawa arus deras dan hilang entah ke mana walaupun seorang lelaki bernama Ibrahim cuba menolongnya. Ibrahim yang dihalau keluar oleh bapanya tinggal di pondok berhampiran dengan jambatan di mana Hamidah terjun ke dalam sungai. Sedang Ibrahim mengarang lagu, Hamidah telah datang kepadanya dan mula timbul bibit-bibit cinta antara mereka. Hamidah juga memberitahu kepada Ibrahim bahawa dia ingin menghukum Haron dan rakan-rakannya yang sering mengancam keamanan kampung.

programme.title: Semerah Cindai
programme.desc: Kelana mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Mahaguru Buana untuk membalas dendam kepada orang-orang yang membunuh kedua ibu bapanya. Selepas tamat perguruan, Kelana bertemu dengan seorang lelaki tua bernama Bagok, seorang pemabuk dan kaki judi. Dia mempunyai seorang anak gadis bernama Atma. Tanpa disedari Kelana, Bagok adalah salah seorang penyamun yang membunuh ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Panggilan Pulau
programme.desc: Percintaan antara Zulkifli dan Jelita mendapat tentangan daripada Johan yang merupakan abang kepada Jelita. Akibat sering dihina kerana tidak memiliki harta, Zulkifli membawa diri dan menjadi kelasi kapal dengan bantuan Umar dan Ramlee. programme.title: Siti Zubaidah
programme.desc: Apabila seorang rakyatnya dihukum penjara seumur hidup atas kesalahan menipu, Kerajaan Tartar telah mengisytiharkan perang terhadap negeri Kembayat Negara yang diperintah oleh Sultan Zainal Abidin. Apabila perang meletus, kerajaan Tartar berjaya menakluk Kembayat Negara serta menangkap baginda sultan. Siti Zubaidah, isteri kepada baginda sultan merancang untuk membebaskan suaminya daripada tahanan serta menyerang kerajaan Tartar dengan bantuan kerajaan Yunan.

programme.title: Lanang Sejagat

programme.title: Puteri Gunung Banang
programme.desc: Wira dan dua orang abangnya, Terab dan Toba adalah tiga orang lelaki tua yang hidup di pinggir sebuah desa dalam keadaan miskin. Pada suatu hari, ketika Wira pergi ke Gunung Banang dia telah ditakdirkan untuk masuk ke alam bunian dan bertemu dengan seorang puteri. Wira terkejut apabila melihat wajahnya kembali muda. Sebelum meninggalkan alam bunian dan kembali ke alam nyata, Puteri Gunung Banang telah menghadiahkan Wira semangkuk air hikmat yang mampu menjadi penawar kepada pelbagai penyakit. Apabila berita kehebatan Wira mengubati pesakit ini tersebar, Terab dan Toba merasa iri hati dan merancang untuk melakukan sesuatu.

programme.title: Pendekar Sakti
programme.desc: Sakti belajar ilmu persilatan dengan bapanya Mahaguru Buana. Selain itu, Dadah dan Dalang juga menjadi murid kepada Mahaguru Buana. Setelah tamat perguruan, ketiga-tiga pendekar ini membawa haluan masing-masing. Sakti keluar mengembara untuk mencari bapa saudaranya, Dadah pergi menuntut ilmu dengan mahaguru lain. Malangnya Dalang hanyut dalam ketamakan harta dan kuasa sehingga sanggup membunuh Mahaguru Buana. Apabila Sakti pulang, Dalang membuat fitnah dengan mengatakan kematian Mahaguru Buana adalah angkara Dadah. Sakti bersumpah untuk menuntut bela di atas kematian bapanya.

programme.title: Satria
programme.desc: Bongkok seorang pemuda cacat sejak dia dilahirkan. Dia sering dipandang hina oleh orang kampung kerana sifatnya yang tidak sempurna. Bongkok mempunyai seorang adik bernama Putra yang handal dalam ilmu persilatan. Putra memendam perasaan terhadap Wati, anak Tok Ketua. Pada suatu hari, Putra bersama rakannya, Durja dan beberapa orang pendekar telah diarahkan untuk menjadi utusan perdamaian antara Tok Ketua dengan Panglima Jalit. Malangnya rundingan perdamaian itu gagal dan berlaku pertumpahan darah. Bongkok pula membawa diri ke suatu tempat untuk mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Pak Guru. Satu komplot telah dibuat oleh Durja untuk merampas Wati daripada Putra.

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Putera Amran, pewaris takhta kerajaan Zamin Ambar telah dititahkan oleh ayahandanya untuk berkahwin dengan Puteri Faridah dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Namun, Putera Amran tidak bersetuju dengan titah ayahandanya kerana dia mencintai seorang penari istana yang bernama Norlela. Kerajaan Zamin Tauran berasa amat terhina dan merancang sesuatu untuk mengambil alih tampuk pemerintahan kerajaan Zamin Ambar dengan cara Puteri Faridah mesti berkahwin dengan baginda sultan Zamin Tauran.

programme.title: Isi Neraka
programme.desc: Kedatangan agama Islam di sebuah kampung tidak disenangi oleh Wira dan rakan-rakannya. Mereka yang gemar membuat kacau di kampung itu sering mengganggu penyebaran dakwah Islam. Kehadiran Tuan Guru ke kampung itu juga telah membuatkan lebih ramai orang kampung memeluk Islam, namun Wira tetap mempersoalkan kekuasaan Tuhan.

programme.title: Mata Shaitan

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@12
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Just Wanna Dance S2 Ep4

programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan Suzana di sebuah pangsapuri mewah yang dipercayai mempunyai kaitan dengan Ramon (Faizal Hussein). Ramon merupakan adik kepada Frankie. penjenayah yang ditumpaskan oleh Unit Gerak Khas dalam satu operasi menentang kumpulan militan dan sindiket pengedaran dadah 2 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Aku Kata A, A
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Amin yang bekerja di sebuah kilang terpikat dengan Aida yang berasal dari Kelantan selepas mereka terlanggar di tempat kerja.

programme.desc: Sebuah kisah komedi tentang perkahwinan Farel (Kamal Adli) bersama isteri-isterinya. Dalam perkahwinan pertama, Farel dipaksa berkahwin dengan Intan (Zulin Aziz) oleh ibunya dengan alasan Intan baru kehilangan ibunya dan tinggal sebatang kara sedangkan pada masa yang sama Farel sudah pun mempunyai pilihan hatinya sendiri iaitu Bella (Ain Edruce).

programme.title: Ehian
programme.desc: Ehian, seorang gadis yang mengembara dari bahagian Timur Laut Thailand untuk bekerja di Bangkok untuk mendapatkan wang bagi membayar hutang ibunya. Kehidupan tidak seperti yang dia harapkan, bekerja keras dan tidak cukup untuk mencari rezeki. Suatu hari, dia bertuah kerana bertemu dengan ketua datuk bandar, Likit dan membantunya pulang ke kampung halamannya. Dia memutuskan untuk menyertai pertandingan ratu cantik tempatan dan menang. Dia menjadi seorang yang terkenal dan membuatkan Loyt mahu menculiknya. Akhirnya Pasin datang menyelamatkannya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9

programme.title: Cucu Atuk
programme.desc: Pak Zubir menjaga cucunya, Aiman yang menjadi yatim piatu apabila kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan. Bapa Aiman seorang usahawan berjaya dan telah mewasiatkan harta yang banyak kepada Aiman. Pak Ngah dan Mak Ngahnya berniat jahat untuk membolot harta tersebut. Niat mereka didorong apabila Juwita meminjam wang daripada Ah Long dan gagal melunaskan pinjaman.

programme.title: Teacher Chan Ram
programme.desc: Chan Ram dibesarkan di sebuah kampung di mana ibu bapa sudah biasa menghantar anak perempuan mereka bekerja di Bangkok. Dia hanya tamat darjah 4 sahaja kerana tidak mampu untuk menyambung pelajaran. Bagaimanapun, dia membuka sekolah kecil untuk mengajar orang-orang bukit dengan sokongan ibu bapanya dan Siwapong rakan sekolahnya yang pulang ke kampung dan membantunya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Mahmud, seorang taikun yang berkahwin dengan seorang janda yang mempunyai seorang anak lelaki, Zubaidah adalah pengusaha restoran. Baharum, anak kepada zubaidah berkawan dengan Mahmud anak angkat Mira sejak kecil. Apabila dewasa, hubungan mereka semakin kuat dan mereka saling menyayangi. Maher, bimbang harta peninggalan bapanya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Sabarnya Istri Yang Terzolimi
programme.desc: Diana terkejut apabila orang ramai mencari suaminya dan menuntut tanggungjawab. Ternyata selama ini Dody (suaminya) mencari rezeki dengan melakukan penipuan.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S12 Ep7
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Jasmine
programme.desc: Gerak manja Jasmine menyayangi dirinya membuatkan hati Zaman berdetik mencintai Jasmine. Sayang telah bertukar menjadi cinta tanpa dipinta. Untuk itu, walaupun diusia 33 tahun, Zaman masih sendiri. Hati Zaman terguris kala Jasmine menyatakan cintanya pada lelaki lain. Awal segala-gala pada Jasmine kerana Awal cinta pertamanya.

programme.title: Cucu Atuk
programme.desc: Pak Zubir menjaga cucunya, Aiman yang menjadi yatim piatu apabila kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan. Bapa Aiman seorang usahawan berjaya dan telah mewasiatkan harta yang banyak kepada Aiman. Pak Ngah dan Mak Ngahnya berniat jahat untuk membolot harta tersebut. Niat mereka didorong apabila Juwita meminjam wang daripada Ah Long dan gagal melunaskan pinjaman.

programme.title: Tmo Cuti-Cuti Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Cuti-Cuti Cinta

programme.title: Jangan Pindahkan Makam Ayah Ibuku
programme.desc: Mengisahkan perjuangan dan penderitaan seorang anak yang mempertahankan makam ke dua orang tuanya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Ibu Menuntunku Ke Surga
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Jaka dan Rani yang menyuruh orang untuk membakar rumah ibunya sendiri supaya mereka dapat menjual rumah itu selepas kebakaran.

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep2
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: My Stupid Bos
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Tmo 3 2 1 Cinta

programme.title: Tiada Tajuk
programme.desc: Tiga orang pemuda kampung yang ingin menjadi penyanyi rock dan pop terkenal. Mereka berimpian besar tetapi tidak dihargai di kampung mereka. Pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan perlu mereka hadapi demi mencapai impian.

programme.title: Viral Alam Maya
programme.desc: Kisah Hazmin cukup aktif di laman sosial. Dia selalu menghebahkan info-info tanpa usul periksa malah turut menokok tambah cerita agar lebih sensasi.

programme.title: My Sweet Madu
programme.desc: Sebuah kisah komedi tentang perkahwinan Farel (Kamal Adli) bersama isteri-isterinya. Dalam perkahwinan pertama, Farel dipaksa berkahwin dengan Intan (Zulin Aziz) oleh ibunya dengan alasan Intan baru kehilangan ibunya dan tinggal sebatang kara sedangkan pada masa yang sama Farel sudah pun mempunyai pilihan hatinya sendiri iaitu Bella (Ain Edruce).

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Mike dan Yo yang memasuki kelab pertarungan bawah tanah yang dipanggil "Fighting Fish" di mana kematian tidak dapat dielakkan bagi yang kalah dalam pertarungan.

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie II
programme.desc: Inspektor Mazlan dan Inspektor Aleeza ditugaskan untuk menyiasat tentang satu sindiket penyeludapan dadah terbesar di Malaysia yang diketuai oleh seorang penjenayah yang bernama Raziman. Sindiket ini mempunyai berpuluh-puluh pengedar di seluruh negara dan dikaitkan dengan satu sindiket dadah antarabangsa.

programme.title: Cinta Bersegi-Segi
programme.desc: Zin Ruby dan Ana dahulunya adalah teman rapat semasa zaman persekolahan. Tamat persekolahan mereka bertembung semula di sebuah pusat karaoke apabila masing-masing sudah berpuluh tahun tidak bertemu. Zin kini menduda setelah kematian isteri. Ruby juga keseorangan setelah bercerai dengan suaminya, manakala Ana pula masih keseorangan tanpa teman.

programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Silang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Amir seorang pereka grafik yang baru sahaja berkahwin dengan Dura. Selepas berkahwin, barulah Dura sedar yang Amir mempunyai masalah disleksia kronik dan anak mereka juga ada masalah sama.

programme.title: Bakal Suami Akan Datang
programme.desc: Seorang pereka grafik yang baru menamatkan pengajian sedang mencari pekerjaan dalam ekonomi yang teruk ini, apabila dia bertemu seorang mekanik dan jatuh cinta dengannya.

programme.title: Saat Taubat Meruntuhkan Keangkuhan
programme.desc: Danil yang pada mulanya bersikap angkuh dan bengis terhadap isterinya, hanya mampu meratapi nasibnya setelah menerima hukuman yang pedih untuknya. Sejak peristiwa itu, Danil berusaha untuk bertaubat dan mengatur hidupnya semula.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep4
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Ilhami Ep3
programme.desc: Sebuah dokumentari realiti mengenai orang-orang yang memberikan inspirasi hidup walaupun menghadapi cabaran.

programme.title: My Idol Memang Tak Ada Lawan
programme.desc: Feli dan Morgan kedua-duanya mempunyai misi untuk dapat menonton konsert secara langsung di tempat duduk VIP. Sementara itu, Morgan mempunyai perasaan terhadap Feli lebih daripada sekadar menjadi rakan.

programme.title: Ada Dusta Dibalik Kerudung Najwa
programme.desc: Halimah sedang memerhatikan anaknya, Fira belajar mengaji di surau ketika tiba-tiba Najwa, anak perempuannya yang lain, masuk dengan keras. Najwa kesal kerana Fira menolak uji bakat sebagai model demi mengejar impian menjadi guru mengaji. Ketika pertelingkahan mereka, Najwa menolaknya dan secara tidak sengaja tertimpa lampu yang menyebabkan dia pengsan. Dalam keadaan tidak sedarkan diri, Najwa didatangi figura misteri yang menyuruhnya bertaubat. Malah dia seperti melihat rupa neraka itu.

programme.title: Ibu Tanpa Surga Di Telapak Kakinya
programme.desc: Beberapa gadis muda yang cantik keluar dari bilik uji bakat. Jawatankuasa kelihatan memanggil nama gadis seterusnya untuk masuk ke bilik uji bakat. Apabila nama Vandra disebut, tiada bayangan Vandra kelihatan. Jawatankuasa itu keliru dan akhirnya memanggil peserta lain. Anggi muncul dari tandas dan kelam-kabut mencari anaknya, Vandra. Dia dilihat merayu kepada jawatankuasa itu supaya anaknya diberi peluang. Jawatankuasa menunggu selama satu jam lagi kerana uji bakat akan ditutup.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep8
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep262
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Love Languageku Padamu Huoo Huoo
programme.desc: Manda dan Arvan baru pulang bercuti secara tidak sengaja mereka menaiki teksi bersama, walaupun Manda yang menempah teksi terlebih dahulu. Tanpa disedari, Manda memikul bagasi Arvan begitu juga sebaliknya. Bukan sahaja bagasi mereka ditukar, malah hati mereka juga.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover theyve switched bodies.

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life, Soo-In escaped from the prison and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Yet their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: The Devil'S Deal
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a disgraced Korean researcher who claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Min-jun and Ji-won are first-rate "players" who are used to getting their way in the field of love and sex -- until they run into each other.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: A Little Princess
programme.desc: A woman's life takes a turn for the better when she meets her granddaughter for the first time.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: The Whistleblower

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep1011
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep1516
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1898
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep34
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: A Chinese Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Young demon hunter Yan loves the fox spirit Xiao Qian but has to rid her memories of him as a human cannot love a demon. Years later, Ning meets Xiao Qian and they fall in love. Yan advises Ning to give Xiao Qian up as she is now controlled by an evil Tree Demon but he refuses. As the Tree Demon seeks revenge, Xiao Qian also starts to remember Yan.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her fathers MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lans MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the clubs and her honour.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fianc to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - Black Leopard. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of Black Leopard, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Danger Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lous brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 8
programme.desc: The Impractical Jokers, Sal, Joe, Murr and Q meet after the show to talk about their favorite moments during the show not to mention the most uncomfortable, most embarrassing, most humiliating and most outrageous. It is a chance for the viewers to hear about all the behind the scenes mishaps and awkward scenes as well as see outtakes never seen before.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr head to the Lone Star State in a special episode that proves even embarrassment is bigger in Texas. The city boys from New York whip up trouble teaching cowboy skills on a ranch, and forget their southern hospitality trying to sell western wear. And it's a real drag for tonight's loser at what is definitely his first rodeo.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 10
programme.desc: The guys give a taste of their awkward customer service at a liquor store, take tickets of humiliation at a deli counter, and try to get signatures to recognize phony holidays. And tonight's losers pay a frigid price in a coldhearted double punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 11
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr try to warm up to strangers at a ski lodge and pull up a chair as uninvited guests at an Italian restaurant. And tonight's punishment takes the cake when the loser is the surprise entertainer at the wrong party

programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. Takingthese criminals to task is our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Jared Logan, and Kevin McCaffrey.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 23
programme.desc: Michael loses a credit card in a series of absorbing containers, and then in an art store, he shakes off sloppy handwriting to reveal fancy calligraphy. Later, a catering assistant gets spooked when chinaware sets itself.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean - Completing the Planet Earth trilogy, Planet Earth III documents more habitats and animals.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan - This final episode sees Joanna Lumley travel across the post-Soviet, Central Asian states of Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan, the heartland of the Silk Road.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S2 Ep3
programme.desc: We explore the secrets of the superfactories producing hi-tech, hi speed sailing equipment, tiny treats in collectible dispensers, a national dish and five-star carpets.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Greenland - Robson Green is in Greenland, where he catches redfish and is shown how to cook it by his fishing opponent.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Jasper, Terry, and Gumbo Ep6
programme.desc: Embrace an invasive nutria whos become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, and visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum. Explore a swimmers bond with wild gray seals and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble Ep4
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Return to the Wild Ep5
programme.desc: The Eastern Cape Province is investing heavily in ecotourism and conservation as an alternative to fishing and commercial development. The region is reclaiming farmlands and closing fishing grounds for wildlife. This is one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Usana the Cheetah Cub Ep3
programme.desc: Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, shes got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Drought Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Stripes of Serima Ep4
programme.desc: The vets have Zebras on their minds. The endangered and beautiful Grevys zebras have to be isolated to bel breed. On the other side of the reserve, the more common zebras are destroying the cattles grazing land and have to be moved.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - The Enemies Within Ep5
programme.desc: Vet Batian is leaving Ol Pejeta after six years and he's organizing his team for one last action: a massive translocation of three speciesabout 500 animals. But when things go wrong, the staff is forced to come up with plan B.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Tidal Forest of Africa Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Okavango: Lifeblood of the Kalahari Ep2
programme.desc: Take a look at one of Africas most abundant and diverse wildlife areas, the Okavango Delta. Investigate the way the delta functions and learn about the variety of interesting species that live in the area.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Urban Penguins Ep3
programme.desc: Living on the southwestern tip of Africa is an unusual colony of African penguins. Most African penguins prefer to breed on off-shore islands in the region, but human interference on their island homes has caused many birds to look elsewhere for suitable breeding sites.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Precious Waters Ep4
programme.desc: Life in the savannas of Africa is ruled by water. And throughout the long dry season, life-giving rivers run dry and harsh drought conditions prevail, making waterholes crowded.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboon Lagoon Ep6
programme.desc: Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continents most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Elephant Dilemma Ep2
programme.desc: Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Monkey Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australias most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboon Lagoon Ep6
programme.desc: Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continents most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Flood Ep2
programme.desc: Waters flood Southern Florida's mangroves and marshes. Many of the 600 animal species that live in the Everglades disperse during this time, expanding their hunting and breeding grounds.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - The Enemies Within Ep5
programme.desc: Vet Batian is leaving Ol Pejeta after six years and he's organizing his team for one last action: a massive translocation of three speciesabout 500 animals. But when things go wrong, the staff is forced to come up with plan B.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Here Comes the Rain Ep6
programme.desc: Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Apex Predators Ep1
programme.desc: Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Hippo River Ep4
programme.desc: The Luangwa River is a lifeline for animals-and home to the worlds largest concentration of hippos. See how these hippos spend their days dealing with heat, insects, and threats from their fellow river-dwellers.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - The Lower Zambezi Ep4
programme.desc: Food, water and shelter are essential to all life on earth from the smallest of beings to the largest, and along the banks of one of Africas greatest rivers, some animals struggle while others thrive. A rhythm drives all animals as they journey in search of what they need to survive, and each must decide where and when to move if theyre to succeed... These are the magical worlds of the Lower Zambezi.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.
